channel.title: Need java master
channel.description:
two questions 1.How do i take off "im new to runeslay" in a runeslay source (562)
2. How do i make items untradable in a 562 source, (runeslay)
3. How do i do custom yell titles in a 562 source (runeslay)
any help is greatly wanted. Thanks for all your time in answering these questions :)

item.title: Need java master
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

u dont even need to no that mutch java to do this, however idk rsps very well but the java way of doing this would be,

  1. find the string of text and change it.

  2. ex. if statement, if(intrade() && itemid == ####) { sendmessage(“u cant trade this item”);}

  3. u probly need a yell command first and just set up an if statement like for example, if(yell && playername.equalsIgnoreCase(“XXXX”) { yell("TITLE: ");} im not exact on this stuff but u can mess around with it.

Read full topic
